resources.string: View the current content in MyAnimeList

Thank you for installing my app!\n\nThis is my first attempt to make an Android app, so if there are any issues, please feel free to send me a message! This app was made out of a personal desire to get to MyAnimeList faster right from SeriesGuide, so I decided I would make this! I\'m sure I\'m not the only person that wanted this, so I shared it with the world too! Enjoy!
